alert.note: Alert for Escambia Coastal; Okaloosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Coastal (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 3:58PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong winds to impact coastal areas through early evening... A wake low has developed behind the departing line of storms this afternoon. East southeast winds are increasing and will become strong and gusty through the rest of this afternoon into early evening before gradually diminishing from west to east later this evening. Wind gusts up to 40 mph will be possible for a few hours and this could result in any loose objects being blown around and potentially some localized power outages. Please use caution if traveling or spending time outdoors for the remainder of this afternoon through early evening. Please pass along any reports of high winds or wind damage to the National Weather Service in Mobile, AL.

area.areaDesc: Escambia Coastal; Okaloosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Coastal
